text.div:
This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/permission-to-share-with-doctor defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
1 I give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.
2 I do not give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.

name: PermissionToShareWithDoctor
title: Questionnaire codes for neuro consent
description: The codes required for neuro consent

concept.display: I give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.
I do not give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.
